tagline: Administration and Information Technologies at The Broad Institute
body:
!# [Alison image](https://github.com/alisonkozol/alisonkozol.github.io/blob/master/alison.png)
Alison Kozol
alisonkozol [at] gmail [dot] com
(781) 915-4786

## Administration and information technologies 
### _August 2014-_, The Broad Institute, Cambridge, MA
•Learn and implement a variety of front-end frameworks, content management systems, versioning software, and database frameworks.
•Develop and design websites 
 * http://www.cellprofiler.org
 * http://www.broadinstitute.org/~anne
 * http://www.broadinstitute.org/bbbc
•Coordinate website and software analytics
•Develop and document workflows for internal software and web applications.
•Assist collaborators with software installation, web development, and general technical support
•Manage social media networks and SEO
•Assist in the preparation of scientific/technical presentations.
•Plan small and large scientfic events
•Edit scientific papers and grant proposals
•Assist new Platform employees in configuring and learning the administrative and software systems of the Platform.

## Skills: ### user experience testing, analytics,
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
